00064     UILayer::UILayer(const String& name, Gorilla::Layer* GLayer, Gorilla::Screen* GScreen)
00065         : Name(name),
00066           GorillaLayer(GLayer),
00067           Parent(GScreen)
00068     {
00069         Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00070     }
00071 
00072     UILayer::~UILayer()
00073     {
00074         while(!Buttons.empty())
00075         {
00076             UI::Button* button = Buttons.back();
00077             delete button;
00078             Buttons.pop_back();
00079         }
00080         while(!Rectangles.empty())
00081         {
00082             UI::Rectangle* rectangle = Rectangles.back();
00083             delete rectangle;
00084             Rectangles.pop_back();
00085         }
00086         while(!Captions.empty())
00087         {
00088             UI::Caption* caption = Captions.back();
00089             delete caption;
00090             Captions.pop_back();
00091         }
00092         while(!MarkupTexts.empty())
00093         {
00094             UI::MarkupText* markup = MarkupTexts.back();
00095             delete markup;
00096             MarkupTexts.pop_back();
00097         }
00098         while(!LineLists.empty())
00099         {
00100             UI::LineList* linelist = LineLists.back();
00101             delete linelist;
00102             LineLists.pop_back();
00103         }
00104         while(!Widgets.empty())
00105         {
00106             UI::Widget* widget = Widgets.back();
00107             delete widget;
00108             Widgets.pop_back();
00109         }
00110         Parent->destroy(GorillaLayer);
00111     }

00152     UI::Button* UILayer::GetButton(ConstString& Name)
00153     {
00154         for ( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00155         {
00156             if ( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00157             {
00158                 UI::Button* button = (*it);
00159                 return button;
00160             }
00161         }
00162         return 0;
00163     }
00164 
00165     UI::Button* UILayer::GetButton(Whole Index)
00166     {
00167         return Buttons[Index];
00168     }

00170     Whole UILayer::GetNumButtons()
00171     {
00172         return Buttons.size();
00173     }

00175     void UILayer::DestroyButton(UI::Button* ToBeDestroyed)
00176     {
00177         for ( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00178         {
00179             if ( ToBeDestroyed == (*it) )
00180             {
00181                 delete ToBeDestroyed;
00182                 Buttons.erase(it);
00183                 return;
00184             }
00185         }
00186     }

00365                 switch (Type)
00366                 {
00367                     case UI::Widget::Scrollbar:
00368                     {
00369                         UI::Scrollbar* Scroll = static_cast<UI::Scrollbar*> (ToBeDestroyed);
00370                         delete Scroll;
00371                         return;
00372                     }

00374                     {
00375                         UI::CheckBox* Check = static_cast<UI::CheckBox*> (ToBeDestroyed);

00377                         return;
00378                     }

00380                     {
00381                         UI::ButtonListBox* ButtonList = static_cast<UI::ButtonListBox*> (ToBeDestroyed);
00382                         delete ButtonList;
00383                         return;
00384                     }

00387                         UI::ListBox* List = static_cast<UI::ListBox*> (ToBeDestroyed);
00388                         delete List;
00389                         return;
00390                     }

00400                 Widgets.erase(it);

00447     UI::Button* UILayer::CheckButtonMouseIsOver()
00448     {
00449         if(Buttons.empty())
00450             return 0;
00451         if(!GetVisible())
00452             return 0;
00453         UI::Button* button = NULL;
00454         for( std::vector<UI::Button*>::iterator it = Buttons.begin() ; it != Buttons.end() ; it++ )
00455         {
00456             button = (*it);
00457             if(button->IsVisible())
00458             {
00459                 if(button->CheckMouseHover())
00460                 {
00461                     return button;
00462                 }
00463             }
00464         }
00465         return 0;
00466     }
00467 
00468     UI::Widget* UILayer::CheckWidgetMouseIsOver()
00469     {
00470         if(Widgets.empty())
00471             return 0;
00472         UI::Widget* widget = NULL;
00473         for( std::vector<UI::Widget*>::iterator it = Widgets.begin() ; it != Widgets.end() ; it++ )
00474         {
00475             widget = (*it);
00476             if(widget->IsVisible())
00477             {
00478                 if(widget->CheckMouseHover())
00479                 {
00480                     return widget;
00481                 }
00482             }
00483         }
00484         return 0;
00485     }
